title: I just realized...
body:
Helmet bro is in Cass' new splash... He even has his broken sword.

Helmet bro is planning his next strike.

replies.body:
He's planning to ambush Stashu next time he picks Cass to return her to her pre-rework state.

Unfortunately for him, as well as all of us, Stashu doesn't play Cass.

Theres 2 of them. Another in the back w the shield.... 

This leads me to believe that helmet bro is everywhere = is a god
Who knows maybe those are azir soldiers .
AZIR SOLDIERS CONFIRMED AS HELMET BRO
